about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure where teamwork and creativity are your greatest tools!
In Build Up!, you and your friends will guide a stranded hero back to their spaceship by building a path with random objects. Whether you're working together or competing against each other, the fun and challenges never stop in this chaotic and exciting journey!

Key Features

  • Unleash Creativity Together: Team up in Co-op mode to build paths collaboratively and reach the spaceship as a team. Strategize, stack, and support each other to overcome rising obstacles!

  • Compete for Glory: Challenge your friends in Versus mode to see who can construct their way to the top the fastest. It's a race to the stars—are you up for it?

  • Dynamic Environments for Endless Fun: Every playthrough brings new challenges with randomized environments and objects. No two games are the same, keeping the adventure fresh and exciting.

  • Puzzle and Strategy Elements: Work smart to combine objects creatively, ensuring your path is sturdy and providing a way back if you fall.

  • Addictive Multiplayer Gameplay: The chaos of building and competing with friends adds a layer of hilarity and excitement to every session.

The more, the merrier! Grab your friends and see who has what it takes to build, climb, and conquer in Build Up! Will you be the ultimate builder or the first to fall?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalen
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Build Up! is a chaotic, multiplayer adventure where you and your friends build paths with random objects to reach the spaceship. Team up in Co-op mode or race in Versus to see who builds faster. Endless fun, dynamic environments, and strategy await!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Russian, Turkish
